alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Broome, southeastern Cortland, Chenango and northwestern Susquehanna Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 332 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Willet to near Le Raysville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Norwich, Kirkwood, Conklin, Guilford, Plymouth and North Norwich. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 8. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 67 North and 81. Interstate 88 between 1 and 7. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
